name: SlashMobility
description:
We are a Mobile Corporate Solutions company founded in Barcelona in 2010, our mission is focused on accelerating the technological digitalization of society through 360º Mobile services.
During these years we have become a leading company in the market through software development training and recruitment of digital talent. Currently,  our +70 employees have developed +1,000 Mobile solutions for +150 companies. Our Talent department has trained + 1000 professionals in Digital Technologies incorporating +250 IT professionals in the labor market in 2017.
 
Our business areas:
Digital Hub: We offer consulting services to asses our clients on their IT strategy by defining user-centric, business-oriented digital experiences.
Concept Studio: We conceptualize omnichannel intuitive and usable technology solutions through UI / UX Design and Visual Design services.
Software Development: We develop mobile solutions by applying the most innovative technologies, a combination of Continuous Delivery with Agile methodologies.
Recruitment: Our IT profiles recruitment services allow our clients to transform the IT talent capturing process into a strategic activity.
Careers: We ease the companies talent identification and retention processes, as well as the development and evaluation of the companies internal capabilities.
Innovation: We use our innovation laboratory to design Open Innovation programs by generating collaborative models between companies and startups.
